column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=It all began when I woke up in the morning and noticed the messiest hair I had ever seen in my entire life .
#id=2
#text=I looked like a porcupine with its burrs all sticking straight out in every direction .
#id=3
#text=There was no way I was going to be seen in public like this .
#id=4
#text=I hurried to get ready and wet my head completely to make it seem like it was a normal hairdo .
#id=5
#text=I quickly went to the barber shop to get a complete buzz so that I will never have to see that ugly porcupine hair ever again .
#id=6
#text=The barber quickly buzzes my hair and then blends it together so that it looks normal .
#id=7
#text=We talk during the appointment about my life and how my school is .
#id=8
#text=She is a very nice lady and we get along quite well .
#id=9
#text=The haircut only costs $ 15 but I pay with a $ 20 and let her keep the change .
#text=I believe everyone who does a good job deserves a tip !
